text: The Jamaica men's cricket team is organised by the Jamaica Cricket Association (JCA). Although it is the national team of Jamaica, it does not play international matches. The JCA is a member of the West Indies Cricket Board (WICB), which represents several Caribbean nations in the International Cricket Council (ICC). Jamaicans play internationally for the West Indies. The team has been active since 1895. Home matches are played at Sabina Park, in Kingston. ==References== Category:First-class cricket teams in the West Indies Category:National sports teams of Jamaica
title: Jamaica men's cricket team
